text: Malaa, Samuel guu made, gei digau Israel huogodoo gu tangitangi gi mee, gaa danu a mee i lodo taalunga i di guongo o maa go Ramah. Gei ogo Saul gu hagabagi gi daha digau hai buubuu mo digau gahi aga mouli dangada huogodoo gii hula gi daha mo Israel.28.3 Leviticus 20.27; Deuteronomy 18.10-11; 1 Samuel 25.1
